summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1466, for the improvement of Whatcom Avenue, from Railroad Avenue to Hanford Street; and Hanford Street from Utah Street to Whatcom Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by constructing a plank roadway 20 feet in width thereon, under Ordinance No. 15773 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
